TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IChannelCredentials

summary.span: Interfejs, który umożliwia ustawienie niektórych funkcji zabezpieczeń serwera proxy usługi.

span.span: An interface that allows the setting of certain security features on a service proxy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Niezarządzane klienci używają moniker "Usługa" Aby uzyskać dostęp do [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] usług.Unmanaged clients use the "service" moniker to access [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] services. Ci klienci są uzależnione [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] model zabezpieczeń, a nie w modelu COM zabezpieczeń.These clients are subject to the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] security model rather than the COM security model. Interfejsu podano Aby określić poświadczenia kanału.The interface is provided to specify channel credentials. Jest to wymagane, ponieważ COM moniker nie może uzyskać dostępu do zarządzanego [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] modelu obiektu zabezpieczeń.This is required because the COM moniker cannot access the managed [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] security object model. Nie można wywoływać metod w `IChannelCredentials` interfejsu po utworzeniu kanału.It is not legal to call methods on the `IChannelCredentials` interface after the channel is created. Jest to spowodowane [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] nie obsługuje zmienianie ustawień zabezpieczeń w kanale już otwarty.This is because [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] does not support changing security settings on an already opened channel. Kiedy klient moniker usługi uzyskuje serwer proxy, kanał nie został jeszcze utworzony.When the service moniker client obtains a proxy, the channel is not yet created. W związku z tym należy wywołać klienta `IChannelCredentials` metod przed wywołaniem metody usługi.Thus, the client must call `IChannelCredentials` methods prior to invoking the service method. Jeśli klient wywołuje `IChannelCredentials` metoda po wywołaniu metody usługi, RPC_E_TOO_LATE jest zgłaszany wyjątek.If the client calls an `IChannelCredentials` method after the service method is invoked, the exception RPC_E_TOO_LATE is thrown. ## Examples ``` monString = "service:mexAddress=http://localhost:8000/ServiceModelSamples/Service?wsdl" monString = monString + ", address=http://localhost:8000/ServiceModelSamples/Service" monString = monString + ", binding=BasicHttpBinding_ICalculator, bindingNamespace=http://Microsoft.ServiceModel.Samples" monString = monString + ", contract=ICalculator, contractNamespace=http://Microsoft.ServiceModel.Samples" Set monikerProxy = GetObject(monString) 'Set the Service Certificate. monikerProxy.ChannelCredentials.SetServiceCertificateAuthentication "CurrentUser", "NoCheck", "PeerOrChainTrust" monikerProxy.ChannelCredentials.SetDefaultServiceCertificateFromStore "CurrentUser", "TrustedPeople", "FindBySubjectName", "localhost" 'Set the Client Certificate. monikerProxy.ChannelCredentials.SetClientCertificateFromStoreByName "CN=client.com", "CurrentUser", "My" MsgBox monikerProxy.Add(3, 4) ```

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetClientCertificateFromFile (string fileName, string password, string keyStorageFlags);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetClientCertificateFromFile(string fileName, string password, string keyStorageFlags) cil managed
Public Sub SetClientCertificateFromFile (fileName As String, password As String, keyStorageFlags As String)
public: void SetClientCertificateFromFile(System::String ^ fileName, System::String ^ password, System::String ^ keyStorageFlags);

span.span: File name that contains the certificate.

summary.span: Pobiera certyfikat z pliku i dodaje go do poświadczeń klienta.

span.span: Retrieves a certificate from a file and adds it to the client credentials.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Gdy `keyStorageFlags` ma wartość null lub pustego ciągu, domyślny magazyn flagi są używane.When `keyStorageFlags` is set to null or an empty string, the default storage flags are used.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetClientCertificateFromStore (string storeLocation, string storeName, string findType, object findValue);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetClientCertificateFromStore(string storeLocation, string storeName, string findType, object findValue) cil managed
Public Sub SetClientCertificateFromStore (storeLocation As String, storeName As String, findType As String, findValue As Object)
public: void SetClientCertificateFromStore(System::String ^ storeLocation, System::String ^ storeName, System::String ^ findType, System::Object ^ findValue);

summary.span: Pobiera certyfikat z magazynu certyfikatów i dodaje go do poświadczeń klienta.

span.span: Retrieves a certificate from a certificate store and adds it to the client credentials.

span.span: Retrieves a certificate from a certificate store by name and adds it to the client credentials.

summary.span: Pobiera certyfikat z pliku i dodaje go do poświadczeń usługi jako domyślnego certyfikatu.

span.span: Retrieves a certificate from a file and adds it to the service credentials as the default certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Gdy `keyStorageFlags` ma wartość null lub pustego ciągu, domyślny magazyn flagi są używane.When `keyStorageFlags` is set to null or an empty string, the default storage flags are used.
